### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron ore mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a chest at position(x=43.5, y=-82.5)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)
### Furnace group at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-82.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace (position x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-79.0)
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)
### Lab at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)
Consists of lab and nearby inserter and chest
### Inserter group at position(x=3.5, y=0.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner inserter (position x=3.5, y=0.5) 
-  Burner inserter (position x=0.5, y=3.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items
-  Make sure the chest at the drop position is not full before extracting items
-  Ensure the agent has enough fuel to extract items
### Errors when using extract_item API
-  Check the quantity of items being extracted does not exceed the available amount in the chest
-  Ensure the agent is at the correct position to extract items from the chest
### Errors when refueling drills
-  Check the drill's fuel level before refueling to avoid overfilling
-  Ensure the agent has enough coal in its inventory to refuel the drill
### Errors when using burner mining drills
-  Ensure the chest at the drop position is empty before mining to avoid stopping the drill
-  Check the drill's fuel level and refuel when necessary to avoid stopping the drill
### Errors when using steam engine and boiler
-  Ensure there is a fluid (water) present in the connections to the steam engine
-  Ensure the boiler has enough fuel to produce steam for the steam engine
### Errors when using offshore pump
-  Ensure the offshore pump is connected to a pipe group to transport the fluid (water)
-  Check the fluid box of the offshore pump to ensure it has enough fluid (water) to pump
